root: ^I'm a Warrior, and I'm here to kill you!

c-1: ^I don't believe you. My mom died last week from lung cancer. She was in a lot of pain... It's... really sad. Please don't make jokes like this. It really hurts my feeling and it's very disrespectful to an old woman who just passed away.
^Sorry... I'm a warrior who's here to kill you.
^Good. I'm glad your mom suffered and died.
^H...How can you say something like that?! Do you think I don't have any feelings?!
^I guess monsters have feelings, too, after all

KILL_YOU: ^Why... I am just living my life. I don't have any intention to cause anyone any trouble... I lead a lawful life, but people keep taunting me and saying that I'm a monster because of my size and how I look... Please leave me alone...
^I don't care, I just want to kill a monster.
MONSTER_RANT: ^I am NOT a monster! I KNOW I'm not... as if I could ever think otherwise. Never. Never! You people'll never change. Every since I was 9, always the same! Couldn't stop judging me. "But he looks so scary... he must be evil..." What a sick joke! I should have killed everyone since day one!! And that includes YOU!
